description: This file defines the ProfileScreen widget for a Flutter mobile application. It constructs a user profile page with avatar, email, display name, bio, and edit/save buttons.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the user profile screen with avatar, name, email, and editing options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the ProfileScreen widget, assembling the scaffold with app bar, drawer, and profile content.
